scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.build: if [ -d frontend ]; then cd frontend && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && npm run build && cd .. && cp -r frontend/dist dist && cp vercel.json dist/vercel.json 2>/dev/null || true; else echo 'Error: frontend directory not found' && pwd && ls -la && exit 1; fi
scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix frontend && npm install --prefix backend
scripts.vercel-build: pwd && ls -la && if [ -d frontend ]; then echo 'Found frontend directory' && cd frontend && npm install --no-workspaces --legacy-peer-deps && npm run build; else echo 'Frontend directory not found. Current directory contents:' && ls -la && exit 1; fi
